price: Dan engkau (Muhammad) tidak berada di sebelah barat (lembah suci Ṭuwa) ketika Kami menyampaikan perintah kepada Musa, dan engkau tidak (pula) termasuk orang-orang yang menyaksikan (kejadian itu),
arabic: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ ٱلۡغَرۡبِيِّ إِذۡ قَضَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَى ٱلۡأَمۡرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلشَّٰهِدِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wamā kunta bijānibi al-gharbiyi idh qaḍaynā ilā mūsā al-amra wamā kunta mina al-shāhidīna
